DTMod:StackedDeckPower.NAME: Stacked Deck
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Look at the top #b
cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

DTMod:BondingPower.NAME: Bonding
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBonding, choose #b1 of #b3 random bonuses, slightly better than potions.

DTMod:CalculatedDefensePower.NAME: Calculated Defense
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the damage from Weakened enemies by #b

DTMod:AdaptationPower.NAME: Adaptation
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your deck, put ALL Innate cards into your hand.

DTMod:ShadowImagePower.NAME: Shadow Image
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains #b

DTMod:HuntersMarkPower.NAME: Hunter's Mark
DESCRIPTIONS: When dragon attacks this enemy, gain #b

DTMod:SafeguardPower.NAME: Safeguard
DESCRIPTIONS: The #yRear no longer loses #yBlock at the start of your turn.

DTMod:BattleHarmonyPower.NAME: Battle Harmony
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever both You and Dragon attacks in a single turn, gain #b

DTMod:ResonanceFormPower.NAME: Resonance Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever You or Dragon gains Strength, Dexterity, Block or HP, the other gains a copy of it.
